prompts.prompt: crystal palace with walls and spires made of shimmering blue crystals, surrounded by glowing crystal shards embedded in the ground
floating wizard’s academy with multiple towers connected by stone bridges, suspended in the sky with swirling clouds below
elven treehouse with elegant wooden arches, delicate vine railings, and glowing lanterns hanging from branches
dwarven forge built into a mountainside, with massive iron doors, stone chimneys, and glowing lava flowing nearby
faerie cottage with a thatched mushroom cap roof, tiny colorful doors and windows, surrounded by giant glowing mushrooms
tower of necromancy, with dark stone bricks, skull carvings on the walls, and green mist emanating from the windows
enchanted library with floating bookshelves, glowing orbs lighting each section, and ancient scrolls scattered across wooden tables
arcane sanctuary with large stained-glass windows depicting magical symbols, an altar of glowing crystals, and floating runes in the air
dragon rider’s citadel on a rocky cliff, with open platforms for landing, stone dragon statues, and fire torches lining the walls
ancient druid circle with massive stone pillars, a mystical pool in the center, and glowing rune carvings on each stone
haunted mansion with twisted iron gates, cracked stone gargoyles on the roof, and mist swirling around the darkened windows
enchanted lighthouse with a crystal top that emits a magical glow, surrounded by wisps of light hovering around the structure
goblin market hidden in a cave, with makeshift wooden stalls, glowing fungi lighting the paths, and trinkets scattered everywhere
sorcerer’s tower with spiraling stairs on the outside, an observatory dome at the top, and magical wards etched into the stones
elaborate fae court with flower petal archways, glistening fountains, and tall grass fields filled with butterflies and fireflies
underwater merfolk palace with coral towers, seaweed banners, and luminescent fish swimming around the windows
orc war fort with spiked wooden barricades, massive bone totems, and a large central bonfire surrounded by tents
floating crystal shrine with a circular platform, levitating crystals in the center, and radiant beams of light reaching upward
dark fairy grotto with jagged stone pillars, luminescent moss, and small ponds reflecting the eerie glow of fireflies
